name: Kingway Unity Demo
description:
After that I made the game in Godot Engine. I have carried the game to Unity3d then I lost my motivation on developing, even I forgot the project. There are some features on unity3d version which Godot Version hasn't, for example inventory system, riding horse, items.

The demo is made with Unity3D 2018.1.7f1 in 2018

Controls:
WASD to movement
E to get items from ground and ride horse
tab to open inventory

Old Godot Engine Version of the 2017 Game: https://cenullum.itch.io/kingway
And Timelapse of old project:
